verses.verse: There were present <S%G3918><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> that season <S%G2540><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> that told <S%G518><s%> him of the Galilaeans, <S%G1057><s%> whose <S%G3739><s%> blood <S%G129><s%> Pilate <S%G4091><s%> had mingled <S%G3396><s%> with their sacrifices. <S%G2378><s%>

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answering <S%G611><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Suppose <S%G1380><s%> you that these <S%G3778><s%> Galilaeans <S%G1057><s%> were sinners <S%G268><s%> above <S%G3844><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the Galilaeans, <S%G1057><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> they suffered <S%G3958><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> things?
I tell <S%G3004><s%> you, No: <S%G3780><s%> but, except <S%G3362><s%> you repent, <S%G3340><s%> you shall all <S%G3956><s%> likewise <S%G5615><s%> perish. <S%G622><s%>

Or <S%G2228><s%> those <S%G1565><s%> eighteen, <S%G1176><s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3638><s%> on whom <S%G3739><s%> the tower <S%G4444><s%> in Siloam <S%G4611><s%> fell, <S%G4098><s%> and slew <S%G615><s%> them, think <S%G1380><s%> you that they were sinners <S%G3781><s%> above <S%G3844><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> men <S%G444><s%> that dwelled <S%G2730><s%> in Jerusalem? <S%G2419><s%>
I tell <S%G3004><s%> you, No: <S%G3780><s%> but, except <S%G3362><s%> you repent, <S%G3340><s%> you shall all <S%G3956><s%> likewise <S%G3668><s%> perish. <S%G622><s%>

He spoke <S%G3004><s%> also <S%G1161><s%> this <S%G5026><s%> parable; <S%G3850><s%> A certain <S%G5100><s%> man had <S%G2192><s%> a fig <S%G4808><s%> tree <S%G4808><s%> planted <S%G5452><s%> in his vineyard; <S%G290><s%> and he came <S%G2064><s%> and sought <S%G2212><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%> thereon, <S%G1722><s%> <S%G846><s%> and found <S%G2147><s%> none. <S%G3756><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> he to the dresser <S%G289><s%> of his vineyard, <S%G289><s%> Behold, <S%G2400><s%> these three <S%G5140><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> I come <S%G2064><s%> seeking <S%G2212><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> this <S%G5026><s%> fig <S%G4808><s%> tree, <S%G4808><s%> and find <S%G2147><s%> none: <S%G3756><s%> cut <S%G1581><s%> it down; <S%G1581><s%> why <S%G2444><s%> encumbers <S%G2673><s%> it the ground? <S%G1093><s%>

And he answering <S%G611><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, Lord, <S%G2962><s%> let <S%G863><s%> it alone <S%G863><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> year <S%G2094><s%> also, <S%G2532><s%> till <S%G2193><s%> I shall dig <S%G4626><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> it, and dung <S%G906><s%> <S%G2874><s%> it:
And if <S%G2579><s%> it bear <S%G4160><s%> fruit, <S%G2590><s%> well: and if <S%G1487><s%> not, then after <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3195><s%> that you shall cut <S%G1581><s%> it down. <S%G1581><s%>
And he was teaching <S%G1321><s%> in one <S%G3391><s%> of the synagogues <S%G4864><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> the sabbath. <S%G4521><s%>

And, behold, <S%G2400><s%> there was a woman <S%G1135><s%> which had <S%G2192><s%> a spirit <S%G4151><s%> of infirmity <S%G769><s%> eighteen <S%G1176><s%> years, <S%G2094><s%> and was bowed <S%G4794><s%> together, <S%G4794><s%> and could <S%G1410><s%> in no <S%G3361><s%> wise <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3838><s%> lift <S%G352><s%> up herself.

And when Jesus <S%G2424><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> her, he called <S%G4377><s%> her to him, and said <S%G2036><s%> to her, Woman, <S%G1135><s%> you are loosed <S%G630><s%> from your <S%G4675><s%> infirmity. <S%G769><s%>
And he laid <S%G2007><s%> his hands <S%G5495><s%> on <S%G2007><s%> her: and immediately <S%G3916><s%> she was made <S%G461><s%> straight, <S%G461><s%> and glorified <S%G1392><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

And the ruler <S%G752><s%> of the synagogue <S%G752><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> with indignation, <S%G23><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> that Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had healed <S%G2323><s%> on the sabbath <S%G4521><s%> day, and said <S%G3004><s%> to the people, <S%G3793><s%> There are six <S%G1803><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> in which <S%G3739><s%> men ought <S%G1163><s%> to work: <S%G2038><s%> in them therefore <S%G3767><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> and be healed, <S%G2323><s%> and not on the sabbath <S%G4521><s%> day. <S%G2250><s%>

The Lord <S%G2962><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> him, and said, <S%G2036><s%> You hypocrite, <S%G5273><s%> does not each <S%G1538><s%> one of you on the sabbath <S%G4521><s%> loose <S%G3089><s%> his ox <S%G1016><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> his ass <S%G3688><s%> from the stall, <S%G5336><s%> and lead <S%G520><s%> him away <S%G520><s%> to watering? <S%G4222><s%>

And ought <S%G1163><s%> not this <S%G5026><s%> woman, <S%G1135><s%> being <S%G5607><s%> a daughter <S%G2364><s%> of Abraham, <S%G11><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> has bound, <S%G1210><s%> see, <S%G2400><s%> these eighteen <S%G1176><s%> years, <S%G2094><s%> be loosed <S%G3089><s%> from this <S%G5127><s%> bond <S%G1199><s%> on the sabbath <S%G4521><s%> day? <S%G2250><s%>

And when he had said <S%G3004><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things, all <S%G3956><s%> his adversaries <S%G480><s%> were ashamed: <S%G2617><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> the people <S%G3793><s%> rejoiced <S%G5463><s%> for all <S%G3956><s%> the glorious <S%G1741><s%> things that were done <S%G1096><s%> by him.
Then <S%G1161><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> he, To what <S%G5101><s%> is the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> like? <S%G3664><s%> and whereunto <S%G5101><s%> shall I resemble <S%G3666><s%> it?

It is like <S%G3664><s%> a grain <S%G2848><s%> of mustard <S%G4615><s%> seed, which <S%G3739><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> took, <S%G2983><s%> and cast <S%G906><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his garden; <S%G2779><s%> and it grew, <S%G837><s%> and waxed <S%G1096><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> tree; <S%G1186><s%> and the fowls <S%G4071><s%> of the air <S%G3772><s%> lodged <S%G2681><s%> in the branches <S%G2798><s%> of it.
And again <S%G3825><s%> he said, <S%G2036><s%> Whereunto <S%G5101><s%> shall I liken <S%G3666><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God? <S%G2316><s%>

It is like <S%G3664><s%> leaven, <S%G2219><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> a woman <S%G1135><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> and hid <S%G1470><s%> in three <S%G5140><s%> measures <S%G4568><s%> of meal, <S%G224><s%> till <S%G2193><s%> the whole <S%G3650><s%> was leavened. <S%G2220><s%>

And he went <S%G1279><s%> through <S%G2596><s%> the cities <S%G4172><s%> and villages, <S%G2968><s%> teaching, <S%G1321><s%> and journeying <S%G4197><s%> <S%G4160><s%> toward <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem. <S%G2419><s%>
Then <S%G1161><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> one <S%G5100><s%> to him, Lord, <S%G2962><s%> are there few <S%G3641><s%> that be saved? <S%G4982><s%> And he said <S%G2036><s%> to them,

Strive <S%G75><s%> to enter <S%G1525><s%> in at <S%G1223><s%> the strait <S%G4728><s%> gate: <S%G4439><s%> for many, <S%G4183><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, will seek <S%G2212><s%> to enter <S%G1525><s%> in, and shall not be able. <S%G2480><s%>

When once the master <S%G3617><s%> of the house <S%G3617><s%> is risen <S%G1453><s%> up, and has shut <S%G608><s%> to the door, <S%G2374><s%> and you begin <S%G756><s%> to stand <S%G2476><s%> without, <S%G1854><s%> and to knock <S%G2925><s%> at the door, <S%G2374><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> open <S%G455><s%> to us; and he shall answer <S%G611><s%> and say <S%G2046><s%> to you, I know <S%G1492><s%> you not from where <S%G4159><s%> you are:

Then <S%G5119><s%> shall you begin <S%G756><s%> to say, <S%G3004><s%> We have <S%G2192><s%> eaten <S%G5315><s%> and drunk <S%G4095><s%> in your presence, <S%G1799><s%> and you have taught <S%G1321><s%> in our streets. <S%G4113><s%>

But he shall say, <S%G2046><s%> I tell <S%G3004><s%> you, I know <S%G1492><s%> you not from where <S%G4159><s%> you are; depart <S%G868><s%> from me, all <S%G3956><s%> you workers <S%G2040><s%> of iniquity. <S%G93><s%>

There <S%G1563><s%> shall be weeping <S%G2805><s%> and gnashing <S%G1030><s%> of teeth, <S%G3599><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> you shall see <S%G3700><s%> Abraham, <S%G11><s%> and Isaac, <S%G2464><s%> and Jacob, <S%G2384><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> the prophets, <S%G4396><s%> in the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and you yourselves thrust <S%G1544><s%> out.

And they shall come <S%G2240><s%> from the east, <S%G395><s%> and from the west, <S%G1424><s%> and from the north, <S%G1005><s%> and from the south, <S%G3558><s%> and shall sit <S%G347><s%> down <S%G347><s%> in the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>
And, behold, <S%G2400><s%> there are last <S%G2078><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> shall be first, <S%G4413><s%> and there are first <S%G4413><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> shall be last. <S%G2078><s%>

The same <S%G846><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> there came <S%G4334><s%> certain <S%G5100><s%> of the Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> to him, Get <S%G1831><s%> you out, and depart <S%G4198><s%> hence: <S%G1782><s%> for Herod <S%G2264><s%> will <S%G2309><s%> kill <S%G615><s%> you.

And he said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Go <S%G4198><s%> you, and tell <S%G2036><s%> that fox, <S%G258><s%> Behold, <S%G2400><s%> I cast <S%G1544><s%> out devils, <S%G1140><s%> and I do <S%G2005><s%> cures <S%G2392><s%> to day <S%G4594><s%> and to morrow, <S%G839><s%> and the third <S%G5154><s%> day I shall be perfected. <S%G5048><s%>

Nevertheless <S%G4133><s%> I must <S%G1163><s%> walk <S%G4198><s%> to day, <S%G4594><s%> and to morrow, <S%G839><s%> and the day following: <S%G2192><s%> for it cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1735><s%> be that a prophet <S%G4396><s%> perish <S%G622><s%> out of Jerusalem. <S%G2419><s%>

O Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> kill <S%G615><s%> the prophets, <S%G4396><s%> and stone <S%G3036><s%> them that are sent <S%G649><s%> to you; how <S%G4212><s%> often <S%G4212><s%> would <S%G2309><s%> I have gathered <S%G1996><s%> your children <S%G5043><s%> together, <S%G1996><s%> as a hen <S%G3733><s%> does gather her brood <S%G3555><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> her wings, <S%G4420><s%> and you would <S%G2309><s%> not!

Behold, <S%G2400><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> house <S%G3624><s%> is left <S%G863><s%> to you desolate: <S%G2048><s%> and truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, You shall not see <S%G1492><s%> me, until <S%G2193><s%> the time come <S%G2240><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> you shall say, <S%G2036><s%> Blessed <S%G2127><s%> is he that comes <S%G2064><s%> in the name <S%G3686><s%> of the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>
